summary: PHP SDK has multiple bugs when running with PHP 8.2, affecting both functional and unit tests across different dependency versions and Windows platform.
userImpact: Users running PHP 8.2 experience test failures and potential runtime issues with the SDK.
resolutionDetails: Issue was resolved, likely through compatibility fixes for PHP 8.2 support
keyQuote: There are few bugs when SDK-PHP is run with PHP 8.2
